thread.title: Dr. Sanjay Gupta's Message on Medical Marijuana
thread.title_full: Dr. Sanjay Gupta's Message on Medical Marijuana

title: Dr. Sanjay Gupta's Message on Medical Marijuana
text:
Dr. Sanjay Gupta's Message on Medical Marijuana Posted: reddit 
What a pleasure it was to have Dr. Sanjay Gupta stop by Mondays with Marlo. We discussed a very controversial topic in the media today: medical marijuana. Dr. Gupta spent months covering the topic in a three-part series for CNN, in which he uncovered a lot of truths and deceptions about cannabis. He gave us his own message about medical marijuana for everyone, including the medical community, during his visit. Watch the video above to listen to his message and don't forget to submit your questions on Twitter and Facebook for our future guests.
